poemsDataJson.list_full: 立(た)ち別(わか)れ いなばの山(やま)の 峰(みね)に生(お)ふる まつとし聞(き)かば 今(いま)帰(かへ)り来(こ)む
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Though we are parted,//If on Mount Inaba's peak//I should hear the sound//Of the pine trees growing there,//I'll come back again to you.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Tachi wakare|Inaba no yama no|Mine ni ouru|Matsu to shi kikaba|Ima kaeri kon
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: まつとしきかは いまかへりこむ
poemsDataJson.author: 中納言行平(ちゅうなごんゆきひら)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 別れに際して名残を惜しむ人への挨拶
